greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: the n-th row consists of the coefficients in the expansion of Sum_{j=0..n*(n+1)/2} A008302(n+1,j)*x^j*(1 - x)^(n - min(n, j)), where A008302 is the triangle of Mahonian numbers.
formula: T(n,k) = A008302(n+1,k) for n + 1 <= k <= n*(n + 1)/2, n > 1. - _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 14 2018
mathematica: Table[CoefficientList[Sum[M[n + 1][[m + 1]]*x^m*(1 - x)^(n - Min[n, m]), {m, 0, Length[M[n + 1]] - 1}], x], {n, 0, 10}]//Flatten
program: A008302(n, k) := ratcoef(ratsimp(product((1 - x^j)/(1 - x), j, 1, n)), x, k)$
create_list(ratcoef(expand(P(x, n)), x, k), n, 0, 10, k, 0, hipow(P(x, n), x)); /* _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 14 2018 */
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Oct 05 2006
ext: Edited, new name, and offset corrected by _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 14 2018
